original_title: Sweethearts Special 22: School Sucks And I Suck Too!
overview: Are all those girls in class actually listening to their teachers or are their minds on something else all together? We followed a couple of them after class and found out that geometry, algebra and history aren't really their most popular subject. However, some live lessons in biology are something they are all in for, especially when those lessons are given by some well hung studs!
title: Sweethearts Special 22: School Sucks And I Suck Too!
